    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void enqueue​(Viewer.ViewerQueuedEvent viewerQueuedEvent)
    Call the super method if the ViewQueuedEvent isn't a SET_SUBTURN Type and there isn't another SET_SUBTURN
    private void prepareCardsPhase​(Viewer.ViewerQueuedEvent queuedEvent)
    Sets and shows the correct CLISubTurnViewer between ChooseCardsPhase and SelectMyCardsPhase using the length of cardSelection's List in queuedEvent's payload when viewStatus == GAME_PREPARATION, or it doesn't anything for other cases
    private boolean prepareMessage​(Viewer.ViewerQueuedEvent queuedEvent)
    Sets and shows the correct representation of the message on the CLI using some CLIStatusView or CLISubTurnView if it is necessary
    private void prepareStatusViewer​(Viewer.ViewerQueuedEvent queuedEvent)
    Read the ViewerQueuedEvent and if contains a StatusViewer set and show it
    private void prepareSubTurnViewer​(Viewer.ViewerQueuedEvent queuedEvent)
    Checks the ViewerQueuedEvent when its type is SET_SUBTURN, then adds its CLISubTurn (if there is) to CLIStatus (if it is correct)
    void refresh()
    For all the subTurnStatus which use the board, this method checks the subTurnStatus and shows it if it isn't player turn or if he/she must place another worker
    void run()
    Continues to read the message and calls the correct methods as long as there is an fatal error o and EXIT message
    private void undo()
    Menage the undo request waiting the response for some seconds, then if player responds before time, sends an undo request with the executer, or doesn't anything if he/she isn't.

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      For all the subTurnStatus which use the board, this method checks the subTurnStatus and shows it if it isn't player turn or if he/she must place another worker

      Read the ViewerQueuedEvent and if contains a StatusViewer set and show it

    • prepareSubTurnViewer

      private void prepareSubTurnViewer​(Viewer.ViewerQueuedEvent queuedEvent)
      Checks the ViewerQueuedEvent when its type is SET_SUBTURN, then adds its CLISubTurn (if there is) to CLIStatus (if it is correct)
      Parameters:
      queuedEvent - ViewerQueuedEvent read ( after check that his Type == SET_SUBTURN )
      See Also:

    • prepareCardsPhase

      private void prepareCardsPhase​(Viewer.ViewerQueuedEvent queuedEvent)
      Sets and shows the correct CLISubTurnViewer between ChooseCardsPhase and SelectMyCardsPhase using the length of cardSelection's List in queuedEvent's payload when viewStatus == GAME_PREPARATION, or it doesn't anything for other cases
      Parameters:
      queuedEvent - Event to read ( after check that its Type == CARDSELECTION )
      See Also:
      CardSelection

    • prepareMessage

      private boolean prepareMessage​(Viewer.ViewerQueuedEvent queuedEvent)
      Sets and shows the correct representation of the message on the CLI using some CLIStatusView or CLISubTurnView if it is necessary
      Parameters:
      queuedEvent - Event to read ( after check that its Type == MESSAGE )
      Returns:
      True if end is reached

    • undo

      private void undo()
      Menage the undo request waiting the response for some seconds, then if player responds before time, sends an undo request with the executer, or doesn't anything if he/she isn't. Finally notifies the result with a printed message
      See Also:
      UndoExecuter

    • run

      public void run()
      Continues to read the message and calls the correct methods as long as there is an fatal error o and EXIT message
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class java.lang.Thread
